sentence.Network_en: The current sole superpower is far from being a disinterested observer.
sentence.Network_cn: 当前唯一的超级大国远不是一个公正的旁观者。

sentence.Network_en: There is a lengthy article on Spike Milligan in the Observer newspaper.
sentence.Network_cn: 《观察家报》上有一篇关于斯派克·米利根的长篇文章。

sentence.Network_en: The Observer found the play "a feeble rehash of familiar Miller themes"
sentence.Network_cn: 《观察家报》认为这部剧“是大家熟悉的米勒式主题的拙劣翻版”。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 观察者（Observer）模式又名发布-订阅（Publish/Subscribe）模式。GOF给观察者模式如下定义：定义对象间的一种一对多的依赖关 …

观察者模式（Observer）是一种常见的设计模式，它完美的将观察者和被观察的对象分离开，以松耦合的方式建立一种“观察”的逻辑关 …

l.观察法(observation)：研究者观察时，可以选择完全不参与，仅躲在角落观察记录，也可以选择参与的方式。研究者可以采非结构性 …

means.word_mean: 观众,目击者,调查者,观光者

encyclopedia.content: 系统的监控和故障诊断工具 Observer是支持以太网, Wireless 802.11b/a/g, Token Ring 和 FDDI 网络环境的网络监控和协议分析产品。Observer对于共享和交换式网络环境都提供测试、捕捉和趋势分析功能。 Observer 是一款经济的、纯软件和支持Microsoft Windows系统的监控和故障诊断工具。 Observer 既可以监控单一的LANs/802.11网段，也可以配合探针，使Observer升级为一款监控多个LANs/WANs/802.11a/b/g 网段和广域网的的全分布式

entry.def: You can refer to someone who sees or notices something as an observer .

example.ex: A casual observer would have taken them to be three men out for an evening stroll...
example.tran: 乍一看的话，还以为他们三人是晚上出来散步的。

example.ex: Observers say the woman pulled a knife out of the bunch of flowers and stabbed him in the neck.
example.tran: 目击者说那名女子从花束中拔出一把刀来，扎进了他的颈部。

entry.def: An observer is someone who studies current events and situations, especially in order to comment on them and predict what will happen next.

example.ex: Observers say the events of the weekend seem to have increased support for the opposition...
example.tran: 观察家说周末发生的事件似乎为反对派赢得了更多支持。

example.ex: Political observers believe that a new cabinet may be formed shortly.
example.tran: 政治观察家认为新内阁可能很快就会组建。

entry.tran: （监督重大事件或局势的）观察员
entry.def: An observer is a person who is sent to observe an important event or situation, especially in order to make sure it happens as it should, or so that they can tell other people about it.

example.ex: The president suggested that a UN observer should attend the conference.
example.tran: 总统建议联合国应派一名观察员参加本次会议。

means.word_mean: 1. a person who becomes aware (of things or events) through the senses
2. an expert who observes and comments on something

auth_sentence.content: In other words, classical logic is factually observer-dependent.
auth_sentence.res_content: In other words, classical logic is factually observer-dependent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In other words, classical logic is factually observer-dependent.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表动词,"反复做"; 2. 表名词,"……人或物品,机器"

stems_affixes.word_buile: bat打,击+er表名连续动作→batter接连重击

stems_affixes.value_cn: 喃喃而语,小声低语;抱怨

stut+er反复做→stutter口吃
bank银行+er人→n.银行家
boil沸点+er物品,机器→n.锅炉;热水贮槽
command命令,指挥+er……人或物品,机器→n.司令官,指挥官
condense凝结+er……人或物品,机器→n.冷凝器,电容器
design设计+er……人或物品,机器→n.阴谋家,设计家,制图师
employ雇用+er人→n.雇主,老板
heat热+er……人或物品,机器→n.加热的人,加热器
hijack劫持,拦路抢劫+er……人或物品,机器→n.强盗,劫盗,劫持犯
record记录+er……人或物品,机器→n.记录员,录音[像]机

labor劳动+er……人或物品,机器→n.劳动者
lead领导+er人→n.领袖,领导人;首领
light光+er物品,机器→n.打火机,引燃器
manage经营,管理+er……人或物品,机器→manager经理,管理人员
manufacture制造,加工+er人→manufacturer
observe观察+er……人或物品,机器→n.观测者,观察员,遵守者

strange陌生的+er……人或物品,机器→stranger陌生人

jushi.english: He is always an observer of his promise.
